result.description:
Service to handle dependency and cummunication between widgets in knowledge service portal.
Also handles data for all facet widgets instances.

Each widget accepts an input event(refresh) and throws an output event(updated).
This service catches events from all widgets and decides which other widget to tigger change.

sn_chg_soc.config

result.description:
Generic angular module to trap the focus within a given element.

By default, all visible buttons and all visible elements with tabindex that is not -1 will be tabbable (except disabled ones)

Instructions:
- Include the jsbx file, for example: <g:include_script src="sn.itsm.common.accessibility.jsdbx" />
- Inject the dependency in the application module
- Add the attribute 'trap-tab-focus' (it is an angular attribute directive) to the root element, for example: <div id="cnat" class="cnat-modal" trap-tab-focus="true">
- It is possible to have a different CSS selectors for the tabbable elements to include and elements to exclude. It has to be passed via the parent scope in the object "tabbable", for example:
			$scope.tabbable = {
				"include": "button:visible, [tabindex]:visible, select:visible, input:visible",
				"exclude": "[tabindex='-1'], [disabled='disabled']"
			};
result.name: sn.itsm.common.accessibility
